## urlSelector variable

Selector for extracting the requested URL

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
urlSelector: SyncSelector<UrlWithStringQuery>
```

## Example

Simple example

```ts

const prismyHandler = prismy(
 [urlSelector],
 url => {
   return res(url.path)
 }
)

```
